code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useNavigate,Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AdminLogin=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleAdminLogin=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const res=await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/api/admin/login',{email,password});localStorage.setItem('adminToken',res.data.token);localStorage.setItem('user',JSON.stringify(res.data.admin));navigate('/admin');}catch(err){alert('Login failed.
